narrative:
*   This was a focused inspection limited to the three dogs cited under section 2.40 (b) (2) as a direct non
compliance on November 17, 2014.  Both dogs (  Australian Shepherd: No Identification   /  Jack Russell 012 298
277 )  were examined by a veterinarian and treatment was prescribed.
*  Focused inspection done on 11/18/14 and exit briefing done 11/19/14 were conducted with the licensee.
